social_posts.post_text: On an airplane with time to kill and had to try out this Avatar thing. Some of these are HILARIOUS! #avatars #ai

Richard Serra’s epic steel sculpture in an desolate portion of Qatar’s desert, commissioned by @almayassabnthamad. “East-West/West-East” is comprised of four 45-foot-tall steel plates erected in a line that spans nearly four miles. Walking the plates is a memorable pilgrimage that plays with scale, light, shadows, distances, and optical illusions. Depending on the time of day and year, you are likely to be alone. Exploring this with @whowhatwhit… magic man of art, taste, design, man about Doha, and right hand to Sheikha al-Mayassa al-Thani of Qatar made it even more extraordinary. This was truly one of the the most special and memorable art experiences of my life.

A montage from Doha, Qatar: 
- falcon shopping in Souq Waqif market (a popular sport amongst the local elite)
- Museum of Islamic Art, designed by I.M. Pei
- Mandarin Oriental, home-base in Msheireb (downtown Doha)
- Nobu, for a taste of home 
- National Museum of Qatar, a MUST designed by Jean Nouvel inspired by the desert rose crystal found locally in Qatar’s desert
- the Corniche
- dinner aboard a stunning yacht with @maryjeantully to cruise around Doha Bay
DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your VIP custom immersion in Qatar and to some of our other favorites in the Middle East (Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Saudi Arabia, Oman and Morocco). #thelegacyuntold #fortheintrepid #doha #qatar

The Suite Life. Amazing (Stay)cation… The Mark Hotel is a New York City icon, much like the A-listers who stay there…Anna Wintour, Oprah Winfrey, Woody Allen, Kim Kardashian, and world tennis #1 Novak Djokovic, to name a few. The Mark is ground zero for the Met Gala and NY Fashion Week. It’s also famous for its Jean-Georges-led restaurant, vibey bar, chic “haute-dog” stand, and its striking geometric black & white floors. 

Completely reimagined in 2009 by one of the world’s leading interior designers, Jacques Grange - who designed the homes of Valentino and Princess Caroline of Monaco - The Mark sets a new global standard for boutique-chic, with an avant-garde atmosphere which permeates throughout its 156 coveted guest rooms and suites. Including its two-story, dual full-floor penthouse suite complete with a rooftop terrace affording 360-degree views of the city…currently ranked THE largest and most expensive in the world. 

Much of The Mark’s allure however is its exceptional service and good old fashion location…on Manhattan’s Upper East Side, quietly tucked away on 77th between Madison and Fifth Avenue, and just a half block from Central Park and adjacent Bergdorf Goodman. 

@themarkhotelny @chefjgv @travelandleisure @thepolobar @santambroeus @mrchow @gregorysiff @fredsegal @bogner.official @maisonladuree @casacruzco 

#staycationnyc #themarkhotel #thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

The things David Attenborough documentaries are made of. Grand wilderness. A refuge for wildlife. A rich biodiversity. Whimsical adventure at every turn. Welcome to Clayoquot on Canada’s Vancouver Island in the Pacific Northwest.

Named for Clayoquot Sound, a stunning mosaic of emerald valleys, snow-capped peaks, rushing rivers, clustered islands and endless forest dominated by thousand-year-old trees that extend an astonishing 300 feet up into the sky. A diverse range of ecosystems exist here, from temperate coastal rainforest and old growth conifer forest to oceans and rocky coastal shores. And Clayoquot is at the center of it all. 

Behold bears, whales, seals and sea otter rafts 🦦 delivered with excitement by your very own private guide & canine guide - the latter of which has taken more heli trips than I have or likely ever will.

Just 25 luxury canvas guest tents, cedar hot tubs with sweeping views, an open-air riverside bar, world class private guided experiences... and the food is EXCEPTIONAL. The accommodation is rustic luxury and the experience is extraordinary and all-inclusive. 

Gloriously remote, wonderfully wholesome and simply extraordinary. Clayoquot is both breathtaking and a breath of fresh air at the same time. 

Not too shabby @jennywexx! xx

Climb into a hot air balloon at sunrise, just as the sun pierces the horizon and cruise silently over the iconic landscapes of the Serengeti, the Maasai Mara, or the Namib desert and watch as our planet comes alive.⁠
⁠
Check out our beloved clients @frankiebakhtiari and @davidbakhtiari soaring above the oldest desert in the world and get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next legendary safari!⁠

Welcome to The Lodge at Blue Sky in Park City, Utah and one of my personal favorite properties in the USA. I was incredibly lucky to celebrate my 45th birthday here, and trust me when I say, the resort went above and beyond to ensure that I would not forget the special day. 

Set on a sprawling 3,500-acre ranch, nestled in the glorious Wasatch Mountains of Utah, this resort is a haven for wildlife and boasts a vibrant biodiversity that will leave you in awe. 

A veritable playground for adults, with everything from epic skiing to fly-fishing, clay shooting and hiking. And then my personal favorites - the pampering open-air spa, the farm-to-table food, and the whiskey tasting yurt. Be sure to request the High West Whiskey Rubdown, where you take a shot of their signature whiskey, which they distill on-site, and then lay down on the table…my kind of rubdown. 

One of the most special things about this resort though is the unique horse therapy program where retired horses live out their golden years in the most peaceful and natural of settings - which is such a beautiful thing in and of itself. Here, rather than ride a horse, you help take care of one who has retired and can no longer be ridden. We brushed them, learned how to massage them, and then walked them through an obstacle course to help them work on their mobility. I’ve been riding since I was a young child but this was markedly the first time I felt like I really connected with a horse. 

@blueskyauberge is a very special place, with something for everyone. So, head to my travel agency’s IG account @thelegacyuntold and click on the pinned post to enter to win a 3-night stay at one of my favorite resorts in the USA. The prize package also includes Oprah’s favorite bedding from @cozyearth and a recovery package from @hyperice. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #giveaway

Accidentally Wes Anderson in Egypt 🇪🇬

My trip to Egypt was an escape to a land of ancient wonders and modern delights. From the breathtaking Pyramids of Giza to the bustling streets of Cairo, a sail down the Nile, and a visit with the Nubians, Egypt surprises you in both obvious and unsuspecting ways. 

I happened to visit during Ramadan - it was fascinating to see how the locals celebrated the holy month, with special foods and decorations, as well as the nightly call to prayer. The streets were quiet during the day as everyone fasted, but in the evenings, they came alive with joy and celebration. 

My trip to Egypt was an enriching adventure that provided a unique perspective on the world. From the history and culture to the stunning natural scenery and traditional cuisine, there is so much to discover and appreciate in this incredible destination. I left Egypt with a deep reverence for its beauty and a sense of awe at the extraordinary achievements of its ancient civilization.

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your VIP custom immersion in Egypt. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid #egypt

Introducing the Aman New York, the most exclusive and luxurious hotel in NYC on the corner of 57th and 5th in the historic Crown Building.

The Aman New York is not open to the public, so you may enter its illustrious doors by one of two ways: stay the night (we recommend at least three) or join their private members club (a whopping $200,000 initiation fee). 

The hotel's sleek and minimalist design (including a fireplace in every room) is complemented by specially-treated windows that provide a shockingly quiet and uniquely serene environment, allowing for guests to turn their attention inward and unwind. This feature truly sets the Aman apart from any other hotel in New York City- being in the center of it all and living in total peace and silence.

The spa is massive - an astounding 25,000 square feet with private couples’ suites, a banya, and a traditional hammam (first pic). There are two fabulous restaurants on site, Arva for Italian and Nama for Japanese, alongside the Bar Lounge, subterranean Jazz Club and a collection of alfresco dining terraces. 

The Aman New York is THE ultimate urban oasis!

Welcome to Ol Jogi, an exclusive 60,000 acre private estate in the heart of Kenya. Known for their maximalist decor, hands on conservation experiences, the retro safari-chic vibe and the rich surrounding wildlife - Ol Jogi is a one of a kind, travel gem and an absolute must-stay when in Kenya. It’s also the perfect base to explore dramatic northern Kenya by helicopter. 

The private plane lands on the front lawn so you can walk straight into the open-air living room. This property is wild, both literally and figuratively. There are no fences separating you from the surrounding wildlife, so the animals roam right up to the house. One of the things which sets Ol Jogi apart is the buy-out-only basis on which it operates, guaranteeing that you’ll never have to share this space with anyone but a 6 to 3 loved ones. Every moment spent here is exclusively yours to enjoy, providing a level of privacy and intimacy that is unparalleled..

Adding to the mystique and allure of the estate, the wine cellar lies behind hidden doors, reminiscent of a James Bond film…This clandestine space safeguards an exceptional collection of priceless vintages, safely stored behind the security of a Swiss vault.

Within the expansive grounds of Ol Jogi, a remarkable conservation effort takes place. Here rhinos roam freely. This haven serves as their protected sanctuary, ensuring their preservation for generations to come.

Within this sanctuary, you can visit the on-site veterinary clinic, solely dedicated to the well-being of its inhabitants, and their esteemed canine unit, consisting of highly trained dogs and soldiers, which stands as a powerful force against poachers, protecting the wildlife that call this place home.

Ol Jogi seamlessly blends luxury, conservation, and utter tranquility, offering an unrivaled experience that will leave you longing to return to this extraordinary sanctuary time and time again.

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your next legendary safari.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid #kenya #oljogi

Recap of my trip to Turkey, renowned for its hammams, sprawling landscapes and bustling bazaars. A fascinating nation bridging two continents - here you can find a fusion of Asian and European influences… without a doubt ONE OF MY FAVORITE NEW PLACES I’VE BEEN IN A LONG TIME

• The NEW Peninsula Istanbul is the new Gold standard: sexy rooms with stunning finishes and tech that works, a sultry marble-clad spa and hammam.

• Hot Air Balloon: Soaring above Cappadocia, capturing breathtaking vistas. The only place in the world where hundreds of balloons fly every morning. 

• Gourmet dinners & lavish events aboard stunning gullets and at exquisite venues with @travelandleisure’s Travel Advisory Board 🛥 This group of hospitality visionaries are owners and CEOs of the most important travel agencies in North America, generating over 14.5 billion USD annually. 

• The iconic Hagia Sophia Mosque: a testament to Istanbul’s rich heritage, one of the finest examples of Ottoman architecture and widely considered to be one of the most important things ever built by humans.

• The Basilica Cistern: this massive underground water reservoir provided a water filtration system for the Great Palace of Constantinople.

• Maçakizi: the coolest resort in Turkey - where all the day parties and the world’s best DJs are.

• Cappadocia: this region looks like something straight out of a fairytale. Known for the iconic ‘fairy chimneys’, tall and oddly shaped rock formations, historical rock-cut churches and entire towns built within elaborate cavern systems...

With exceedingly warm hospitality and so many incredible experiences to choose from, Turkey welcomes travelers with open arms. DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning your VIP Turkish immersion. 

#thelegacyuntold #fortheintrepid #turkey #travelandleisure

Sunrise with a coffee or sunset with a whiskey, Ol Jogi’s hide may well be the best in the world. Walk around the bar to a hidden staircase and venture underground to this clandestine tunnel, built beneath the property and adjacent to an active waterhole. At the end of a long, James Bond-esque hallway, this camouflaged shelter provides a unique opportunity to witness amazing wildlife up close. Imagine being just a few feet from a family of wild giraffes or an endangered black rhino. Get close enough to observe the intricate markings on their skin, all while enjoying your favorite drink in complete safety.

Get in touch with me or my travel agency @thelegacyunold to start planning your next once-in-a-lifetime safari.

#oljogi #fortheintrepid #kenya #thelegacyuntold

The Legacy Untold hosted its annual We Are Africa Closing Party this year in the stunning Presidential Suite of the One&Only in Cape Town. A 4,000 square foot two bedroom suite with a striking floor-to-ceiling central fireplace, a carefully crafted media room, a private gym, and 360-degree views of iconic Table Mountain and the Atlantic Ocean. For every stay in the Presidential Suite, $350 is donated to Two Ocean Aquarium Foundation’s Turtle Rescue & Rehabilitation Program, which rescues turtles of all shapes and sizes and then rehabilitates and releases over 85% of them back into the wild. 

On this night, we brought together some of our favorite people from the African continent who are creating the most mind-blowing experiences, redefining what’s possible in luxury lodging, conserving ecosystems, and uplifting local communities. We are so proud to call the incredible people in these photos friends and partners.  
Thank you to our friend One&Only GM Anne Scott and my dear friend MJ for the kind introductions. A huge thank you to Debra Algie for always being the best partner & party planner. And to @cozyearth for their partnership and spectacular gift bags containing many of “Oprah’s Favorite Things” including their sublime bedding. What a special evening! 
@thelegacyuntold @oocapetown @ooresorts @weareafricatravel @cozyearth
#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

social_posts.post_text:
Cairo’s modern slice of the Nile 😮
On a recent scouting trip across Egypt, I stayed at the Four Seasons Cairo. In the heart of the city and at the epicentre of Cairo’s history and antiquities, this is certainly the best hotel in Cairo. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of an urban segment of the iconic Nile River.

Watch Cairo’s breathtaking sunset from the Nile on a traditional felucca or dine at one of the property’s NINE acclaimed restaurants. 

The hotel is mid-refurb on its pool and spa which both promise to be spectacular. 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your VIP immersion in Egypt. Including a signature “Dinner with a Sphinx”, where under a starry sky with live music, you’re able to enjoy an incredible meal in a private tent, with a view of the iconic Pyramids of Giza and the illuminated Sphinx. 

@thelegacyuntold @experienceegypt @fscaironp
#thelegacyuntold #fortheintrepid #egypt

AND THEN THIS HAPPENED (WAIT FOR IT)! Recently back from a month scouting in Australia, scoping out the best of the best to create extraordinary bespoke journeys for The Legacy Untold’s travelers. Among these incredible experiences was one I never thought possible. I was under the watchful eye of a wildlife expert extremely familiar with this particularly mob of kangaroos for decades. The dominant male’s trust of him created a halo effect around me allowing me to slowly and methodically get closer and closer to rub the dominant male’s chest. As you can see, he loved it and wanted more! PLEASE DO NOT TRY THIS YOURSELF. A dominant male like this could easily balance on its tail and use its razor sharp claw to tear you open. I REPEAT, PLEASE DO NOT TRY THIS YOURSELF. DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us create once in a lifetime Australian magic like this for you. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Every once in a while the right destination wedding calls and you know before you go that it’s going to be one for the ages. This was a global invasion of charming Lisbon from troops near and far from New York, London, Paris, Rome, Dubai, and Venezuela descending into a week-long celebration of the marriage of Kamyar & Maria. Two very special people that feel like family. Two people that also allowed The Legacy Untold the privilege of coordinating travel logistics for their loved ones. For a week we mostly drank and danced, sometimes barefoot on the sand at sunset, sometimes in comfy shoes in cobblestone courtyards at sunrise. DJs were flown in from near and far but the best sets came from our own @LuvRoya and the bride @Lamariamaloca who THREW IT DOWN! We sat at huge tables of friends on charming corners of Lisbon pouring out into the street for decadent meals of delicious Portuguese seafood and laughed until we cried. Destination weddings can be exhausting, but to have this much time with so many people I love was a true gift of a lifetime. My dear friend Roya said to me at the end, “I don’t understand what we are all doing. We should all be doing this much more often. Before you know it, it will all be over”. I couldn’t agree more Roya. Thank you Kamyar and Maria for making memories for all of us that will last a lifetime. Wishing you both a lifetime of happiness… we are with you for the ride. Love you guys!

P.S. Sorry I couldn’t tag everyone! IG limits!

A new soul nourishing sanctuary hidden by an amphitheater of Franschoek’s mountains in the bucolic Cape Winelands. A working farm that's just as cool as you would expect when you meet the couple that owns it and also calls it home. THE most interesting combo of bougie & rustic farm that I have yet to experience at this level. Would you believe me if I told you there’s a hammam and a hypnotherapist on property? Chic, charming, historic architecture, oh so thoughtfully designed, and whimsical at every turn. This is Sterrekopje (Ste-re-kopy). 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan the perfect trip for you across South Africa, with the perfect blend of adventure-filled safari, vibey Cape Town, and the breathtaking and now restorative Cape Winelands.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

The Silo is a testament to Cape Town’s artistic and culinary prowess, offering unrivaled urban sophistication. Its’ cutting edge architecture and design pairs with historical elements to honor the history of the incredible city in which it was built. This family-owned stylish retreat sits above the Zeitz MOCAA museum, housing the continent’s largest collection of contemporary African art.

Every suite boasts signature floor-to-ceiling pillowed-glass windows, offering panoramic views of the harbor and mountains to all who stay here. The Penthouse Suite, which I had the great pleasure of staying in, is massive (2,012 square ft.) and stunning, with its own unique style of contemporary art signature to Liz Biden, the matriarch of the family with exceptional taste. Fully equipped with a cinema room, its own spa, two walk-in wardrobes, two stunning marble bathrooms, and two private balconies, each a sweeping 258 square ft. 

Should you deign to leave this suite, head to the spectacular wraparound rooftop terrace, with an infinity pool, two bars and several lounge areas. Paired with 360° views of Table Mountain and the Atlantic Ocean, it remains one of my favorite locales to wind down with a tequila in hand, or wind up for a night out on the town.

To experience Cape Town like a local, DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us start planning your VIP trip to the Mother City. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

The Museum Hotel in Cappadocia is built on the site of a former monastery. Meticulously restored and renovated from ruins, caves, and houses to become the first luxury hotel in the region. This is the majestic Konak Suite - a two-story luxuriously appointed cavernous suite (the juxtaposition is very cool) adorned with antique furniture and Turkish rugs, featuring a spacious bedroom, stained glass windows with phenomenal views onto Cappadocia, a jacuzzi tub, a private garden, a fireplace, its own heated marble pool, and more…

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to plan your VIP immersion in Türkiye.

Wow Cappadocia! Renowned for its unique geological formations called « fairy chimneys », underground cave cities and otherworldly desert landscapes. This region is often described as something out of a fairytale and boasts collections of rock-cut churches, decorated with colorful frescoes in the Byzantine style, which have earned a spot on the UNESCO World Heritage Site list.

The region is also known for the elaborate and captivating depths of Cappadocia’s underground cities. These hidden refuges, meticulously carved into the earth, once provided sanctuary for Christians who sought shelter from persecution. They were historically persecuted by the Roman authorities and later faced challenges under various rulers, including Muslim conquerors. These clandestine cities featured interconnected tunnels, rooms, and carved churches. Derinkuyu, the largest city, possibly housed up to 20,000 people.

One of Cappadocia’s biggest draws are of course the famed hot air balloons. In fact, this might be the only place in the world where hundreds of balloons fly nearly every single morning. At sunrise, fleets of brightly colored balloons take to the skies. This once-in-a-lifetime opportunity was one of my favorites. Extra special paired with the learning that hot air balloons predate all other forms of manned aircraft by more than a hundred years. 

Get in touch with me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to plan your VIP immersion in Türkiye. 

@goturkiye @thelegacyuntold
#thelegacyuntold #fortheintrepid #cappadocia

Watch as‼️1,000 BALD EAGLES‼️swarm, hunt, and scavenge right before my eyes…

I had never seen more than one of these elusive birds at a time. I didn’t even know something like this was possible. Hands down, one of the greatest wildlife encounters of my life. 

When water currents are strong, schools of Pacific herring are propelled up into the air with such force that their stomachs actually explode from the pressure - a phenomenon known as “herring bounce”. The oils inside the fish attract bald eagles and other predators, who are often seen waiting on the shoreline for this explosive moment to occur. 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your next great adventure, putting you in the front row seat to nature’s phenomenal prowess. 👊🏼

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

I spend most of the year working at my desk in NYC designing trips for my travelers… but for several glorious months a year, I have the privilege to obsessively scout the far corners of our planet for my travelers, across all 7 continents, in search of the most extraordinary properties, people, animals and experiences.

I’m incredibly grateful for my life, proud of myself for leaving a career with all the trappings of “success” to pursue purpose and fulfillment though my dream job, fortunate to share this journey with my incredibly talented team, grateful to acknowledge this beautiful journey we’re on, how far we’ve come, and the adventure filled journey the lies ahead. 

New experiences are the joy of my life. Let them be the joy of yours. Life is short. Take the trip. 

“The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” -Lao Tzu

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

I had the great pleasure of spending a week at Arctic Watch on Somerset Island - the most northerly fly-in lodge on Earth.

Owned and run by the Weber family - Richard Weber is the ONLY person to have made it to the North Pole and back on foot.

Arctic Watch runs exclusively on unfiltered glacial melt. In fact, the only water available to you, whether it be for a shower or a drink, is Earth’s untreated water. I forgot my water bottle and drank directly from the rivers all week long. What a luxury!

Your playground is unspoiled Arctic terrain, and the toys are all top notch…quad bikes, mountain bikes, unamags, the best dry suits, helicopters, private planes, you name it. 

Polar bears, narwhal, muskoxen, wolves, foxes and thousands of beluga whales take center stage while glistening glacial waters and otherworldly landscape provide the setting for a once in a lifetime heart-pounding adventure. 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your next extraordinary trip to the most far-flung corners of our planet. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

A legendary week in the High Arctic at #ArcticWatch - the most northerly fly-in lodge on Earth. 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your next extraordinary trip to the most far-flung corners of our planet.

Namibia's rugged beauty stands as evidence of the enduring impact that time has had on shaping its landscape. The forces of nature, wind, water, and geological processes, have all worked together over countless years, to craft the unique features that define its appearance today. The textured dunes, sweeping valleys, and arid expanses all carry the marks of this gradual transformation. The Namib is the oldest and perhaps the most beautiful desert in the world, a lunar landscape unlike anything that I’ve ever seen anywhere else on the planet, and a virtually unknown gem that we pride ourselves on bringing guests to. Our travelers don’t often come to us asking about Namibia, but they always return with a newfound sense of absolute awe and admiration, as I too have done, for an inexplicably special place on Earth that inevitably changes your perspective - even if just for a moment.

My travel agency @thelegacyuntold specializes in these types of whimsical immersions to far-flung destinations across all 7 continents. DM me to learn more.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Cheers to the long weekend and what has got to be THE coolest beer bong funnel. 

To set the scene, this was taken off Vancouver Island on the wild shores of the Pacific Ocean, post-snorkeling through a kelp forest among friendly seals. The last time I funneled a beer was the mid 90s with my NYU college buddy and rockstar companion on this trip, the great @jaydellavalle

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

The energy from traditional Rwandan drumming is electric, and the best way to start off your stay at the absolutely mind-blowing One&Only Gorilla’s Nest.

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to plan a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Remarkable Rwanda. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Aptly named “The Land of 1,000 Hills”, Rwanda contains the world’s oldest rainforest - which remained green even during the last Ice Age. Rwanda is also home to the endangered Mountain Gorilla of which only 1,000 remain in the wild, and with whom we share over 98% of our DNA. 

Perhaps more than the stunning landscapes and extraordinary wildlife, are the people and their boundless positivity, that bring me back to Rwanda time and time again - four times to be exact!

I have stayed in every top luxury hotel in Rwanda (which are as good as anywhere on the continent), completed 10 gorilla treks, journeyed with Kigali’s top fashion designers, award-winning chefs, and noted tastemakers, and was recently honored with delivering the keynote address at the Rwanda Tourism Awards. 

However, one of the moments that I remember most is when @jaydellavalle and I were invited to join Sunday church in the local community.

It’s in this moment that I understood that music and dance were not just expressions of joy but testaments to the strength of a community determined to heal, rebuild, and celebrate life amidst adversity. A little boy came over to us. A curious little ambassador for his church… and placed his hand on top of mine, seemingly to make sure we felt welcome. We certainly did now! ❤️

Rwanda beckons travelers with magic in so many forms, and it’s an invitation we wholeheartedly extend to all who seek the extraordinary. Get in touch with me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning your once-in-a-lifetime trip. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid #remarkablerwanda #mamaafrica

SCENES FROM MARRAKECH POST EARTHQUAKE 🙏

As I landed in Morocco for my 11th annual pilgrimage to Marrakech for @pure_theshow, a 6.8 earthquake struck the mountains of Morocco. There were cracked walls, broken glass and fallen chandeliers… we were certainly shaken up but we were alive and well.

I WRITE TO SHARE WHY SOME HEADLINES HAVE LEAD TO INCORRECT PUBLIC PERCEPTION & WHY IT MATTERS... 

Thousands of Moroccans in the mountains, especially those living in clay homes, were tragically killed. In Marrakech, less than a dozen lives were lost. 

After some clean up and 3 days of national mourning, Marrakech looked and felt pretty normal. Shops, cafes, and restaurants were welcoming travelers with open arms. The stunning resorts were all providing their seamless service. 

I felt guilty that I felt safe in Marrakech when there was so much suffering just 50 miles away. I also felt that the most important thing that I could do was to report the truth from the ground to travelers and the travel industry, and help to provide essential economic support to Marrakech and its people. Zoran Pejovic put it so well, "doing what feels right is not the same as doing what is right” in this situation. The city is almost entirely reliant on tourism, and the public isn’t clear that Marrakech now is perfectly enjoyable and safe to visit. 

It is with this in mind that I share these images and videos of my week in Marrakech as an honest account of what it was like and why you should go… everything is open, prices are down, sites are less crowded, and your presence and dollars are more needed than ever. I close with the words that were echoed over and over again by just about every Moroccan I spoke with, “Please don’t abandon us now… we are ready to welcome you!”
 
A special thank you to @jossakent @sergedive, @danielbrowntravel @maryjeantully @marctelio @jm_zach @elizasharris @eabiden @edwardmorton for being wonderful friends and supporting our community during this challenging time. I am beyond grateful for your friendship, partnership, and the community we share. 
 
May those that tragically past rest in peace. #moroccoearthquake

I was exceptionally honored when the extraordinary fine art collector @eabiden purchased two of my photographs for exhibition at the new and stunning Silo Hotel in Cape Town, residing within The Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa. The Silo is celebrated not only for its unique architecture, but also for its exceptional art collection, which has been thoughtfully curated to complement the exhibits at The Zeitz MOCAA Museum. The Zeitz MOCAA proudly stands as the largest museum of contemporary art from Africa and its diaspora. One piece pictured above, 'Karo Chief', was captured in Ethiopia’s Omo Valley, in 2012, and immortalizes a Karo Tribe Chief adorned in traditional face and body paint, worn with reverence during ceremonies. The paint, crafted from locally sourced white chalk, yellow mineral rock, red iron ore, and black charcoal, embodies the rich cultural heritage of the Karo community. 

#marklakinphotography #thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

social_posts.post_text:
Check out our founder @mark_lakin completing THE most exciting climb of his life. Exclusively accessible by helicopter, at 7,000 feet above sea level and 80 miles from the nearest road, this 1,200-foot cable run sits high above a 28-mile long glacier.

#thelegacyuntold #alaska #viaferrata #mylegacy

Happy World Rhino Day!

When you plan your safari with @thelegacyuntold, you can directly contribute to the preservation of a critically endangered species by joining an experienced conservation research scientist in microchipping or dehorning a wild rhino. 

Under constant threat from poachers because their horns are worth more per pound than gold or cocaine, 96% of rhinos have disappeared over the last 100 years. Placing a microchip in a rhino’s horn allows researchers to help protect them from poachers, and dehorning temporarily removes the horn altogether (it grows back) and is an often necessary precaution in high risk areas. 

During your hands-on experience, the animal is tranquilized, and once sedated you can actually interact with this prehistoric-looking animal, feel the warmth of its breath, the softness of its lips, and the strength of its spirit. Never would you have thought you would be able to feel true empathy for a rhino, until now.

*Within 20 minutes after this, the rhino was on its feet, walking around and back to normal. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid #worldrhinoday

Our founder and his friend @jaydellavalle completely relaxed and well fed at the spectacular Nimmo Bay. Adventure-filled days here end with thoughtfully curated evenings - extraordinary meals, followed by a perfectly cozy fireside perch floating on the calm Pacific water. The best way to unwind. 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold and let us plan your next great adventure.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

At Nimmo Bay, the day isn’t over until you’ve been whisked away to a secret floating dock by boat. This one features a cedar hot tub and is relocated daily for the perfect post-adventure surprise.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

The Democratic Republic of the Congo is one of the world's most perilous places on Earth, but it is also a nation that boasts extraordinary natural beauty and life - the kindest of people, surreal landscapes, magical volcanoes with active lakes of lava, and the enigmatic mountain gorillas who await the most intrepid of travelers. It really is one of the most beautiful places on Earth - often referred to as a lost eden. Lost to human greed and war, yet still absolutely spectacular. 

Visiting the DRC is an incredible journey through remarkable natural landscapes and a complex history. This vast African nation carries the heavy burden of being the site of the largest genocide since World War II. An estimated 7 million lives have been tragically lost here since 1994 when the Rwandan genocide spilled across its borders. Yet, amidst this unrelenting turmoil, there are bright beams of light. Emmanuel de Merode, a Belgian prince turned guardian, leads a dedicated group of park rangers who have transformed into a courageous militia single handedly responsible for protecting Virunga National Park from the rebels. I had the distinct honor of being invited to join him and see his efforts firsthand. His efforts were recognized in the film “Virunga”, produced by Leonardo DiCaprio, and nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature. An extraordinary watch for those who wish to learn more.

Visiting the DRC means navigating a landscape where safety is paramount, as conditions can change abruptly. Responsible tourism here supports those valiantly working to safeguard both the people and the environment and our presence serves as a lifeline to those on the right side of the battle. Those embarking on this profound voyage do so with deep purpose – to shed light on ongoing human rights issues, to offer support to local communities, and to contribute to the preservation of this fragile ecosystem. It's a journey that demands respect and an understanding of the potential for positive change amid adversity. Should you wish to travel to the DRC, you will travel exclusively by helicopter and your trip is booked until it needs to be reconsidered due to changes on the ground.

Soar high above untouched wilderness in Canada’s British Colombia. Enjoy breathtaking scenic flights and touch down somewhere magical to saber some bubbly and toast to time well spent with loved ones. Words and footage fall short in capturing the true beauty of this remarkable experience. 

Get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next trip! 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Our founder @mark_lakin and his partner in adventure @danielbrowntravel embark on a challenging ascent up Nyiragongo in The Democratic Republic of Congo, one of the most active volcanoes in the world.

The hike, brutal yet rewarding, reveals a vast lava lake, spanning nearly 7 football fields. The climb involves drastic temperature shifts, from a balmy base to a freezing summit. Amid this extraordinary setting, a birthday celebration unfolds on the volcano’s very edge. The journey concludes with a powerful once-in-a-lifetime moment—waking up on the volcano’s rim.

Get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next legendary trip. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Reminiscing on these incredible Rwandan vistas. 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next trip to Remarkable Rwanda.

One of our favorite concepts for wildlife viewing is the “hide”. Ingeniously designed in several ways to allow close proximity viewing of animals while on foot, sitting in a chair, or sipping your favorite libation. 

Without the noise of a vehicle, you can hear these animals communicate clearly, and even breathe. 

Get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next safari! 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #namibia

Some highlights from my High Arctic Adventure with @weberarctic and my brother @mr.trentham 👊🏼. DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning yours!

• Biking across lunar terrain
• Glacial melt rivers
• Walking across the frozen ocean
• The best toys - quad bikes, mountain bikes, unamags, the best dry suits, helicopters, private planes…
• Fields of wild Arctic cotton
• Kayaking past glaciers and thousands of beluga whales in a storm
• Massive skeletons everywhere…from polar bears to whales and musk oxen

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

A colorful journey across 7 continents. From the rust colored dunes of Namibia to the azure coast of Australia. What a beautiful world we live in. So much worth fighting for! 

Get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next great adventure to the farthest corners of our planet. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Double rainbows, traditional dhow sailboats, one of our favorite beach bars in the world, sushi & tequila sundowners on private sandbanks, powdery soft sands, friends that are family, and sunsets to remember…this is &Beyond Benguerra in Mozambique.

Where the gravitational pull of the moon causes a 15-foot change in the tides revealing ribbons of white and turquoise amongst the deep blue waters of the Indian Ocean. Absolutely breathtaking at every turn.

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning the trip of your dreams.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid #mozambique

Our founder @mark_lakin on safari in the Tswalu Kalahari Reserve - the largest privately owned conservation area in South Africa. Pursuant to their mission to restore the Kalahari Desert to itself, Tswalu prevails as THE lowest guest footprint in the entire country. 

Get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next safari.

Occupying the 88th and 89th floors of Crown Towers Sydney, the Presidential Villa is one of the most spectacular accommodations in Australia, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Sydney Opera House, the harbor and the city skyline. The villa features three king-size bedrooms with opulent ensuite bathrooms, a private infinity pool that seamlessly blends into the horizon, an expansive terrace perfect for sun-kissed gatherings, a private massage suite, and a state-of-the-art cinema for cozy nights in. With a dedicated butler catering to your every need, the Crown Presidential Villa is not just a fancy place to lay your head; it is an embodiment of refined living designed to elevate your understanding of excellence in hospitality. 

Get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next indulgent escape.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy

Discover Ol Jogi, a 60,000-acre private estate in Kenya blending cinematic views, hands-on conservation, and one of the most whimsical safari experiences to be had on the continent. Reminiscent of a James Bond film, the extensive wine collection is discreetly tucked away at the end of a long, mysterious hallway, secured behind a Swiss vault.

With over 100 endangered rhinos, the conservancy has proven itself as one of the most successful rhino breeding programmes in the country. Ol Jogi is also home to the largest population of Grévy’s zebras in Africa, 40 lions, 500 giraffes, and over 400 elephants depending on the season. 

With no fences, wildlife roams freely, and the buy-out-only policy guarantees unmatched privacy. 

DM @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next legendary safari.

Curl up with a hot coffee (or a chilled glass of wine) and a good book at Nimmo Bay — the perfect setting for a late autumn day. Thankful for blissful moments in time such as these. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy

Cocktails, sunsets, fabulous views, and friends that are family… no one does it like the Silo.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid #humpday #capetown

Alfresco Perfecto - a compilation of some of our favorite outdoor setups from around the world. 

DM us @thelegacyuntold and let us create these special moments for you and your loved ones. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

The Star Dune Suite at @andbeyondsossusvlei consists of two extraordinary suites linked by a covered walkway, with a private lounge and dining space. The split-level guest area, a true masterpiece of glass, rock, and steel, opens up to reveal unobstructed desert vistas. This massive accommodation provides the perfect space for a small family or group of friends to experience the magic of Namibia. 

Star-viewing skylights, a private plunge pool, discrete music systems, a customized personal bar, and glass-encased rain showers with 180º desert views… We of course LOVE the innovative design which harnesses the extremes of this natural environment to create energy and recycle waste water. Each suite is like its very own solar power plant, producing enough energy to not only power the air conditioning, and all the super-comforts of a luxury lodge, but also the water treatment and recycling systems.

If you ask our founder @Mark_lakin, he’ll tell you it’s the single best suite in Namibia and he dreams about waking up here and enjoying his tequila on the rocks by the orange sunset all the time…

Get in touch @thelegacyuntold to start planning your legendary safari across the oldest desert in the world. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid #namibia

Our scenic heli ride ended with a surprise. We landed beside this stand alone one bedroom residence set out in the middle of the Kalahari Desert on Tswalu’s private estate. Stocked with the finest scotches and steaks, our private chef prepared a delicious meal and left us to dine as the sun set. The moon and stars then revealed themselves at their brightest, without a single light to be seen for hundreds of miles. Savoring delicious single malts around a raging bonfire. Falling asleep in the most cozy of beds to the sounds of the animals in the distance in the solitude of this 275,000 acre private estate. This experience is one that I will remember forever. Thank you @tswalu! 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning the safari of your dreams. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Incredible moments from a recent journey down under with my brother @iamnickpags, including this close encounter with a wild kangaroo 🦘 

We woke up early to watch the sunrise over the wind-sculpted Remarkable Rocks on Kangaroo Island. It took 500 million years of rain, wind, and pounding waves to create these uniquely shaped rocks. The process began way back when Tasmania and Australia were part of the supercontinent Gondwanaland 🤯 

A visit to the ancient Daintree Rainforest is an absolute must. At a staggering 180 million years old, it is THE world's oldest surviving tropical rainforest. This ancient wonder predates both the dinosaurs and the last Ice Age. Towering trees, some amongst the tallest on Earth, form a dense tapestry overhead. And you can spend the night beneath it all…

We spent our days hiking through pristine wilderness, swimming in hidden waterfalls, and coming within feet of wild koalas and kangaroos…From Hosier Lane’s ever-changing street art in Melbourne to the captivating wilderness of Tasmania, a unique place known for having some of the cleanest air on Earth - Australia is pure magic. 

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next trip!

Beautiful moments from my recent ‘viaje’ to Costa Rica with @jennywexx. A remarkable resort and wellness center - Hacienda AltaGracia seamlessly integrates with its stunning surroundings, inviting the outside in. Nestled in the Talamanca Mountains, this Auberge property takes a holistic approach to well-being… an iconic spa, natural river baths, a hydrotherapy tub, and a thermal suite are just some of the incredible amenities on offer here. They also provide more spiritual pursuits like palm reading, crystal energy healing and gong baths. 

Unsurprisingly, Costa Rica is celebrated as one of the world's happiest countries. La “pura vida” is truly a way of life here... 

A nature expedition is an absolute MUST - this small yet fierce country boasts over 5% of global biodiversity on just 0.03% of the planet's surface. With 500,000 wildlife species, including over 10% of the world's butterflies, its ecosystems are unparalleled. Impressively, 25% of Costa Rica's land is dedicated to conservation, preserving its vast and wild nature.

DM my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next great escape!

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Which one would YOU prefer? Comment below! 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

The Well and Auberge Resorts have seamlessly merged their expertise to craft an exceptional holistic wellness program at the Hacienda AltaGracia resort, set amidst the stunning Talamanca mountains in Costa Rica. Spanning over 20,000 sq ft of amenities, this massive spa embraces “Pachamama”, Mother Earth, applying a fusion of modern medicine and ancient wisdom to address physical, mental, and spiritual well-being.

They do a fantastic job of highlighting the lush, biodiverse canopy by bringing the outdoors in. The floor-to-ceiling glass walls throughout the spa create for an absolutely breathtaking atmosphere. 

My time at Casa de Agua (an all-glass, greenhouse-inspired oasis, with a massive indoor pool and wrap-around views) was particularly special. Starting with a purifying ritual and a powerful shower, we applied healing Costa Rican blue clay and relaxed on heated marble beds, all while overlooking the Talamanca mountain range. After a quick shower to rinse off the clay, @jennywexx and I took a dip in the tranquility pool for a refreshing cool-down.

All who stay here are encouraged to establish goals and intentions at the beginning of their stay - facilitated by a complimentary consultation with a health coach. This process not only guides the creation of your personalized itinerary during your time on property, but ensures lasting results long after you’ve left.

DM me or my travel agency @thelegacyuntold to start planning your next beautiful escape.

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

2023… I spent much of the year at my desk in NYC designing extraordinary journeys for my travelers…but for several glorious months, I had the privilege to obsessively scout the farthest corners of our planet, across 5 continents, in search of the most remarkable properties & experiences on earth. 

This year brought me to Vietnam, India, the High Arctic, Thailand, Egypt, Australia, Canada, Turkey, Portugal, South Africa, China and Morocco. 

I am profoundly grateful to see the world. And after Covid shut down travel, I will never take traveling for granted again. 

Eat the cake, take the trip and dance like no one is watching. 
@thelegacyuntold can plan your bespoke luxury adventure to all 7 continents. Get it touch… time waits for no one!

Wishing everyone an incredible year, filled with extraordinary travels that give you goosebumps and burn memories with loved ones onto your mind and heart forever. 

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid

Navigating an authentic Vietnamese food market with my travel partner in crime, @maryjeantully, where colorful stalls spill out onto bustling streets, serving flavor-filled phở, bánh mì, fresh seafood, and so much more… 🍜🌶️

#thelegacyuntold #mylegacy #fortheintrepid
